bug.short_desc: Unparseable date error when starting up Eclipse

long_desc.thetext:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Set locale to German 2. Start Eclipse with Task List visible
Exception Stack Trace: java.text.ParseException: Unparseable date: "Thu, 03 Oct 2013 12:00:00 +0000" at java.text.DateFormat.parse(DateFormat.java:357) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.commons.notifications.feed.FeedEntry.getDate(FeedEntry.java:49) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.commons.notifications.feed.FeedEntry.<init>(FeedEntry.java:43) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.commons.notifications.feed.FeedReader.createEntry(FeedReader.java:92) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.commons.notifications.feed.FeedReader.parse(FeedReader.java:57) at org.eclipse.mylyn.commons.notifications.feed.ServiceMessageManager.readMessages(ServiceMessageManager.java:262) at org.eclipse.mylyn.commons.notifications.feed.ServiceMessageManager.refresh(ServiceMessageManager.java:202) at org.eclipse.mylyn.commons.notifications.feed.ServiceMessageManager$1.run(ServiceMessageManager.java:117) at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:53)
I merged the change into master and the 3.10.x branch.
